name: zoninator
description: Curation made easy! Create "zones" then add and order your content!

scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Version %s.' package.json package-lock.json zoninator.php README.md
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Version %s.' package.json package-lock.json zoninator.php README.md
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Version %s.' package.json package-lock.json zoninator.php README.md
